column1: 将一个或多个源对象（通常为高多边形）的贴图烘焙到单个目标对象（通常为低多边形）上。源对象和目标对象必须位于同一位置（重叠）。更多详细信息，请参阅 Blender 文档 "从选定对象到活动对象的烘焙"。
Download and install updated version of: Bake maps from one or more  source objects (usually high poly) to a single target object (usually low poly). Source and target objects must be in the same location (overlapping). See Blender documentation on selected to active baking for more details

column1: 将选定对象烘焙到目标对象
Download and install updated version of: Bake selected objects to target object

column1: 指定烘焙的目标对象。请注意，它不必是视口中选区的一部分（当然也可以是）。
Download and install updated version of: Specify the target object for the baking. Note, this need not be part of your selection in the viewport (though it can be)

column1: 如果您没有使用自定义的笼子对象，那么在烘焙到目标对象时，Blender 会自动从目标对象中挤出一个笼子。自动挤出的笼子可以是光滑的，也可以是坚硬的。注意：如果您正在名称模式下自动匹配高多边形与低多边形对象，那么只有在低多边形对象未检测到笼子对象时，此设置才会起作用。只要存在笼子，该设置就会被忽略。请参阅 "猴子 "提示。
Download and install updated version of: If you are not using a custom cage object, Blender will automatically extrude a cage from your target object when baking to target. That automatically extruded cage can be either smooth or hard. NOTE: If you are auto-matching high poly to low poly objects in name mode, this setting will only be relevant where a cage object is not detected for that low object. It will be ignored whenever a cage is present. See the Monkey Tip.

column1: 法线贴图总是创建为 32 位浮点图像，但该选项会使所有图像都创建为 32 位浮点图像。理论上图像质量会有所提高，但通常并不明显。
Download and install updated version of: Normal maps are always created as 32bit float images, but this option causes all images to be created as 32bit float. Image quality is theoretically increased, but often it will not be noticable.

column1: 在烘焙之前清除现有的烘焙图像（如果有）。启用此选项将确保 SimpleBake 每次烘焙都从空白图像开始。关闭此选项可实现迭代烘焙，每次烘焙都会添加到现有图像中。
Download and install updated version of: Clear the existing bake image (if any) before baking to it. Keeping this enabled will ensure that SimpleBake starts with a blank image for each bake. Turn this off to allow iterative baking where each bake will add to the existing image.

Download and install updated version of: Export your mesh as a .fbx file with a single texture and the UV map used for baking (i.e. ready for import somewhere else. File is saved in the folder specified below, under the folder where your blend file is saved. Not available if .blend file not saved

column1: 在烘焙后隐藏视口中的烘焙源对象。如果您是在背景中烘焙，则导入后会发生此操作。

column1: 在烘焙后隐藏笼子对象
保留烘焙对象的原始材质分配（注意：所有材质都将相同，并指向烘焙纹理集，但每个材质的面分配都将保留）
Download and install updated version of: Preserve original material assignments for baked objects (NOTE: all materials will be identical, and point to the baked texture set, but face assignments for each material will be preserved)

column1: 法线贴图始终以 16 位输出，但该选项会导致所有图像都以 16 位输出。除非文件大小有问题，否则应继续启用该选项
Download and install updated version of: Normal maps are always exported as 16bit, but this option causes all images to be exported 16bit. This should probably stay enabled unless file sizes are an issue

column1: 选择导出烘焙的文件格式。也适用于 Sketchfab 上传的图像
Download and install updated version of: Select the file format for exported bakes. Also applies to Sketchfab upload images

column1: JPEG 的质量，因为它使用有损压缩。与 Blender 本地设置相同
Download and install updated version of: Quality for JPEG as it uses lossy compression. Same as native Blender setting

column1: 创建并保存烘焙/网格的文件夹名称。在保存混合文件的文件夹中创建。注意：为保持兼容性，将只使用 MS Windows 可接受的字符。
Download and install updated version of: Name of the folder to create and save the bakes/mesh into. Created in the folder where you blend file is saved. NOTE: To maintain compatibility, only MS Windows acceptable characters will be used

Download and install updated version of: Apply colour space settings (exposure, gamma etc.) from current scene when saving the diffuse image externally. Only available if you are exporting baked images. Will be ignored if exporting to EXR files as these don

Download and install updated version of: Apply colour space settings (exposure, gamma etc.) from current scene when saving the image externally. Only available if you are exporting baked images. Not available if you have Cycles bake mode set to Normal.  Will be ignored if exporting to EXR files as these don

column1: 打开时，将对添加到烘焙列表中的对象进行烘焙。关闭时，将对视口中选定的对象进行烘焙
Download and install updated version of: When turned on, you will bake the objects added to the bake list. When turned off, you will bake objects selected in the viewport

column1: 帮助您识别背景烘焙任务的名称。该名称可以是任何内容，仅用于帮助跟踪多个背景烘焙任务。名称将显示在下面的列表中。
Download and install updated version of: Name to help you identify the background bake task. This can be anything, and is only to help keep track of multiple background bake tasks. The name will show in the list below.

column1: 通过限制渲染瓦片大小来限制内存使用。更多内存意味着更快的烘焙时间，但也有可能超出电脑性能，导致崩溃或烘焙时间过慢。
Download and install updated version of: Limit memory usage by limiting render tile size. More memory means faster bake times, but it is possible to exceed the capabilities of your computer which will lead to a crash or slow bake times

column1: 应用于这些烘焙的名称（已包含在烘焙文件名中，前提是您已将其包含在图像格式字符串中--请参阅插件首选项）。注意：为保持兼容性，仅使用 MS Windows 可接受的字符
Download and install updated version of: Name to apply to these bakes (is incorporated into the bakes file name, provided you have included this in the image format string - see addon preferences). NOTE: To maintain compatibility, only MS Windows acceptable characters will be used

column1: 默认情况下，PBR 烘焙是以 2 个采样点进行的（因为它们是作为发射烘焙的，不可能出现噪点）。不过，对于包含斜角或 AO 节点的材质，需要增加采样点数。如果在材料中检测到这些节点，则使用此计数
Download and install updated version of: PBR bakes are done at 2 samples by default (as they are baked as emission and noise should not be possible). However, sample count needs to be boosted for materials containing Bevel or AO nodes. If those nodes are detected in your material(s), this count is used

column1: 增强样本数（AO 和斜面）
通常，法线贴图被视为一种特殊情况。无论您的其他设置如何，它们在内部始终是 32 位浮点数，在外部输出时是 16/32 位（所选文件类型的最大值）。启用此选项将关闭这种特殊处理。法线贴图将遵循与其他纹理相同的规则，并受到以下影响
Download and install updated version of: Usually, normal maps are treated as a special case. Regardless of your other settings, they are ALWAYS 32 bit floats internally and 16/32 bit external exports (maximum for chosen file type). Enabling this option turns off that special treatment. Normal maps will follow the same rules as other textures, and be affected by the \
Name to save this preset under

column1: 如果您在线，可能需要在网络服务器上完成 "我不是机器人 "检查。单击此处完成检查。一切都会有解释...
Download and install updated version of: If you are online, you likely need to complete the 'I am not a robot' check on the web server. Click here to do that. All will be explained...

column1: 将导出路径设置为当前混合文件的位置
Download and install updated version of: Set export path to the location of current blend file

column1: 解压所有节点组。如果您的材质中有非常不寻常的节点设置，则可使用此功能。(例如，材料输出节点隐藏在节点组内）。这样做会影响性能，但可以避免某些拥有大量嵌套节点组的材质发生崩溃。
Download and install updated version of: Unpack all node groups. Used if you have very unusual node setups in your materials. (e.g. Material Output nodes hidden inside node groups). This will hurt performance, but can avoid crashes with some materials that have lots and lots of nested node groups

column1: 烘焙 PBR（漫反射 BSDF、光泽度 BSDF 等）时跳过无效 PBR 节点检查 不推荐。
Download and install updated version of: Skip the check for invalid PBR nodes when baking PBR (Diffuse BSDF, Glossy BSDF etc.) NOT RECOMMENDED.

column1: 使用旧的合成器方法进行通道打包
Download and install updated version of: Use the old compositor method of channel packing

column1: 在为具有自定义分割法线的对象制作法线贴图时，自动平滑选项会导致问题。此选项将导致 SimpleBake 在烘焙时禁用自动平滑，以防止法线贴图中出现奇怪的伪影。
Download and install updated version of: The auto-smooth option causes issues when baking normal maps for objects with custom split normals. This option will cause SimpleBake to disable auto-smooth for the bake to stop weird artifacts in the normal map

column1: 覆盖用于 PBR 烘焙的样本数。默认值为 2，通常这对所有 PBR 烘焙都没有问题，因为它们是以发射方式烘焙的（即不可能出现噪点）。
Download and install updated version of: Override the sample count used for PBR bakes. The default is 2, and this is usually fine for all PBR bakes as they are baked as emission (i.e. no noise is possible)

column1: 回滚到以前版本的 SimpleBake
Download and install updated version of: Rollback to previous version of SimpleBake
